DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study understand relationship 3 different dosage form baricitinib . This study also explore effect food body absorbs baricitinib . This study last 5 week , include screen . Screening require within 28 day prior date first dosing .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Baricitinib Healthy Japanese Participants
DOC.criteria: Overtly healthy Japanese male female ( woman childbearing potential menopause ) , determine medical history physical examination Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m^2 ) Are reliable willing make available duration study willing follow study procedure Have abnormality 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , opinion investigator , increase risk associate participate study Have abnormal blood pressure determine investigator Have history current cardiovascular , respiratory , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , endocrine , hematological , neurological disorder capable significantly alter absorption , metabolism , elimination drug ; constitute risk take study medication ; interfere interpretation data Are woman pregnant lactate Have use intend use overthecounter prescription medication , include herbal medication , within 14 day prior dose study . Have donate blood 400 milliliter ( mL ) last 12 week ( male ) last 16 week ( female ) , blood donation ( include apheresis ) within last 4 week , total volume blood donation within 12 month 1200 mL ( male ) 800 mL ( female ) screen . Have average weekly alcohol intake exceed 21 unit per week ( male ) 14 unit per week ( female ) , unwilling abide alcohol restriction Are participant currently smoke 10 cigarette per day ( equivalent tobacco nicotine product ) unwilling abide smoke restriction Have current recent history clinically significant bacterial , fungal , parasitic , viral ( include rhinopharyngitis ) , mycobacterial infection Have absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) less 2000 cells/microliter ( ÂµL )
